title: Who is your most feared champion to play against?
body:
Mine is {{champion:92}}  every time I see one i think boxbox gg
hoping to do a {{champion:76}}  with Mejais+Deathcap+Void Staff

EDIT: Add {{champion:67}} {{champion:75}}  to that list,win or lose lane you lose the late game.

replies.body:
{{champion:53}} 
A good Blitz always gets his ADC fed off of hooks onto me.....so he really scares me. However, I am learning to deal with him, as I should be.

{{champion:134}} 
Lane's unwinnable. No matter what you do

Yeah i don't get this.  The only reason she isn't a MASSIVE problem right now is there are a handful of even more broken, more popular champions.  The scary part is her kit and damage have been too much for as long as I've played this game, so unfortunately I don't see that changing anytime soon :(
{{champion:157}}  He counters her so hard

> [{quoted}](name=BeansOfBozo,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=t9EbgVfE,comment-id=00110000,timestamp=2015-01-11T20:48:19.891+0000)
>
> {{champion:157}}  He counters her so hard

Fight cancer with cancer, who knew

{{champion:105}} 
Even if they suck, eventually they will carry
{{champion:117}}  Nothing is scarier than going ham with the power of the Sun backing me up as {{champion:89}} only to get turned into a measly little squirrel in the middle of the enemy team.

I love Lulu for that reason.  Counters all the most popular "all-in" supports you always see nowadays.

My most hated is a good {{champion:111}} .  If he lands one hook, I might as well afk until im dead.  I'll be stunlocked for 5s or more.
{{champion:105}}  *wet slapping noises*
http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/8/8d/President_Barack_Obama.jpg

{{champion:84}}  80% of the time they get fed by 10 minutes and carry while my entire team builds specifically trying to counter her.
{{champion:105}} Makes me want to just sit under turret for 20 minutes and farm, but I can't really do that because he'll just trollpole the turret.
{{champion:74}} Mixed bag - if they're exceptional on Heimer, then by like 5 minutes I'm ready to flip my desk.
{{champion:55}} As if I need to explain it. In the rare case that Kat doesn't get fed early/is just bad at her, that one match where I wreck her makes up for most of the Kats that just press R.
{{champion:25}} If on my team (supporting): doesn't build sightstone and KS from the ADC, super salty. Their team: builds support properly, can land her Q and her Q gives me time to go make a box of Mac and Cheese, which is nice.
{{champion:75}} My team: Gets completely bullied out of lane and is still farming until 30 minutes OR goes jg Nasus and no one gets ganks. Their team: I for the life of me am unable to push him out of farm and he 1v3s the rest of the match.
{{champion:76}} Either I cringe as she nails *every spear* in lane and flawlessly plays both forms or I laugh like a gleeful schoolgirl as she misses 95% of them and never uses catform.
{{champion:92}} Almost always steamrolls her lane, gets fed and then obliterates us. Also ***EVERY*** time I almost escape her, she Windslashes and gets me. This really grinds me, for some reason. Also, no secondary energy bar infuriates me in lane.
{{champion:17}} Do I really need to explain? 3 second blind among a myriad of reasons.
{{champion:23}} EVERY time I lane against him I have to fight the urge to flip my desk. He always dives me, always outtrades me and (almost) always destroys my lane. Added bonus, almost every time I lane against Trynd, my jg forgets my lane, so I sit under turret, which (against Trynd) does little good.
{{champion:67}} I used to main support. My team Vayne: It's everyone else's fault she DIDN'T get fed/it's ALL HER that she got fed and the team didn't do jack to help her carry. Their Vayne: just as salty.
{{champion:238}} HO HO HO HO.
{{champion:53}} My blitz: Can't land a Q, goes oom entire lane/builds AP/no stone. Their Blitz: Comes in with iBlitz, nails EVERY SINGLE Q and flawlessly feeds their ADC.


I don't get salty or yell at my team/take out my aggression, I usually just stay quiet, but these ones always infuriate me.
{{champion:23}} you will never win top lane against this unkillable machine

any assassin

i main assassins and will usually win mid lane, but then the enemy laner comes bot and when i signal he's missing  my bot lane thinks thats the signal to hard push

so no matter how much i win lane by, they just go bot and get fed off of them
{{champion:126}}  EVERYTIME ITS A GOOD ONE (or... maybe hes op...)
Sorry to say man, but he's just op.  I love me some Jayce

{{champion:114}} 
She has way more early game kill percentage then any of my champs and she completely owns me

If their equal skill, {{champion:134}} 
If their better than me, All of them

they're*
they're*
Can I keep you for my Younger brother? His spelling as atrocious.
{{champion:238}} by far in my opinion is the only real op champion. The ninja without counters

top- anything mannaless,{{champion:126}} or {{champion:17}} 
mid-{{champion:63}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:105}} F***K THESE GUYS
bot-{{champion:53}} + {{champion:29}} = day ruined
jung-{{champion:35}} just farming along then - OMG WTF RUN you have been slain*
aram-{{champion:110}} every time I see him on the other team, I know we lost, I literally have not had one match against him where we won  -__-
Fiddle. Just... PLS NO.

Easy to way to beat him: Buy tenacity, buy a banshies veil, ward your lane. There, you have effectively beat.

Let's not even get started if you pick a champ with a channel interrupt ability....
{{champion:105}} This little shit right here!

{{champion:53}} {{champion:89}} - when I'm bot
{{champion:92}} {{champion:106}}  - when I'm top
{{champion:238}} {{champion:103}} - when I'm mid
{{champion:64}} - just because.
{{champion:17}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:24}}

Top: {{champion:122}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:1}} Either too strong early or inevitably strong.

Mid: {{champion:76}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:55}} They make me explode

Jungle: {{champion:9}} {{champion:35}} For the same reason, I can be starting to push my lane to enemy tower to back and all of a sudden I'm dead.

Bot Lane: {{champion:1}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:119}}  Sudden death, pulled from nowhere, blown away with no kill potential, inescapable snare, or you thought you were safe and then global ult hits you in the face.

{{champion:78}}, Generally if they pick Poppy, they are either trolling. Or they know what they are doing with her and will proceed to 1v5 late game every 2 minutes.

There is never a middle ground with picking her.

Utility {{champion:9}}, 40% CDR and rylai's, he doesn't need to deal damage because he can just keep the enemy team from doing anything ever. I haven't actually run into this, but I've done it and it did not look fun for the enemy team.

{{champion:7}} This champ purely exists to stomp lane and be annoying as shit.

Please remove from game rito, I'm begging you.

Well it's either any of the champions who are designed to ruin entire games once they get slightly fed, or blitz/thresh.  Nothing like hoping to god that your adc/sup can dodge hooks all day cause if not that's a free fed enemy adc.

My only issue is {{champion:89}} .  And she isn't "Scary" On her own.  It's the fact that she can go 0-30 in lane(Exaggeration, but yeah), and still be a walking ball of tanky CC.  If she staggers her CC well, she can keep people locked down for a good long while when needed.  Drives me nuts lol.
{{champion:126}} {{champion:92}}  {{champion:35}}
{{champion:92}}

{{champion:81}} 

Not so much that I fear facing him, as I fear having him make me look like a bitch. I play a lot of tanks and bruisers, he just dances around em like it's nothing. {{champion:51}} can be kind of annoying that way too, especially with {{champion:40}}. Nothing feels worse than trying to gank and never getting a hit on your opponent before you're forced to retreat.
LeBroken. Fizz. Azir. (Lee sin if its ranked)

{{champion:17}} 

He gives me nightmares.

Probably assassins like Katarina, Fizz, Akali, Zed, and Talon.  While I don't really have any issues laning against them or playing against them in teamfights, I don't really trust my teammates to ward, respond to pings or MIAs, or to refrain from feeding my lane opponent when they roam.

{{champion:74}}  The annoying guy to vs, but doesn't really scare me. I DO use him, after all.

{{champion:35}}  REALLY ANNOYING. Keeps stealing CS or something and gets tons of kills.

{{champion:238}}  I literally scream, "RUN" whenever I see him.

{{champion:17}} For a different reason- his invisibility AND basic attack poison.

{{champion:60}} Q and E is so annoying...
{{champion:67}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:64}}
{{champion:83}}
{{champion:92}}
